name: Terra Ball (penquin22, rebca)
description:
== WARNING: THIS GAME WILL NOT WORK PROPERLY ON FIREFOX ==

Controls: Arrow keys to move, Z to jump. The down arrow key lets you merge with the ground (once you've unlocked that ability).

In Terra Ball, you play as a ball of dirt infused with the spirit of nature. You must escape a slime-infested cave from whence you came, and defeat many a foe along the way! Enjoy nail-biting precise platforming and a winding cave map to explore!

Have fun, and good luck!

Note: If the web version doesn't work for you, we have standalone versions available for Windows and Linux.
